main_topic.author: Andreas Bisi
main_topic.title: Are external data helpful?
main_topic.content: Has anyone used the [LMSYS - Additional 33k Labelled Conversations](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/abdullahmeda/lmsys-additional-33k-labelled-conversations) dataset? If yes, are the CV and LB results yielded better or worse? Do you have suspicions of overfitting?
